<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>798c1c18-fe8c-4d57-aa80-eb1ba6b982fc#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szórólencse</string>
            <string language="en">Dispersing lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstreuendes Objektiv</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Objectif de dispersion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lente dispersando-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obiettivo di dispersione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασκορπίζοντας φακός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lente de dispersión</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Optikai lencsék, a szórólencse, nevezetes sugármenetek, képalkotás</string>
            <string language="en">Optical lenses, the dispersing lens, remarkable ray lines, image forming</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fénytan,  optikai lencsék,  szórólencse,  képalkotás,  </string>
            <string language="en">optics,  optical lenses, dispersing lens, image forming,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Objektive, das zerstreuende Objektiv, 
bemerkenswerter Strahl zeichnet, Bildformung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les objectifs optiques, l'objectif de dispersion, 
rayon remarquable raye, formation d'image</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As lentes óticas, a lente dispersando-se, raio 
notável alinham, dar forma da imagem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli obiettivi ottici, l'obiettivo di dispersione,
raggio notevole si allinea, formare di immagine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτικοί φακοί, ο διασκορπίζοντας φακός, αξιοπρόσεκτες
γραμμές ακτίνων, διαμόρφωση εικόνας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las lentes ópticas, la lente de dispersión, 
rayo notable alinean, formación de la imagen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik, optische Objektive, zerstreuendes Objektiv, 
bildendes Bild,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique, objectifs optiques, objectif de 
dispersion, image formant,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico, lentes óticas, lente dispersando-se, 
imagem que dá forma,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica, obiettivi ottici, obiettivo di dispersione, 
immagine che forma,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική, οπτικοί φακοί, διασκορπίζοντας φακός, εικόνα που 
διαμορφώνει,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la óptica, lentes ópticas, lente de dispersión, 
imagen que forma,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">13-14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>

version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
